stimulusHtml: Good X is produced in a perfectly competitive industry in long-run equilibrium. If the consumption of good X generates positive externalities, the private market will produce
choicesHtml: less than the socially optimum amount of good X
more than the socially optimum amount of good X
the socially optimum amount of good X
good X only if the government grants a subsidy for the production of good X
good X only if the government levies a corrective tax on the production of good X
